snippet: The victim succumbed to his injuries more than a week after the altercation, which the police said was caught on video outside a Bushwick restaurant.
abstract: Jose Guzman dies week after getting into fight with man outside Bushwick, Brooklyn, bar; police officers say altercation was caught on video, which they are using to search for suspect and witness in the homicide.
lead_paragraph: The victim succumbed to his injuries more than a week after the altercation, which the police said was caught on video outside a Bushwick restaurant.

headline.main: Suspect and Witness Are Sought in Fatal Brooklyn Fight
headline.print_headline: Suspect and Witness Are Sought in Fatal Brooklyn Fight
